mapper.select: /* ReportMapper.selectReportTempleteDetail */ SELECT RT_ID ,REPORT_TYPE ,REPORT_SUB_TYPE ,TEMPLATE_NAME ,FILE_SERVER_PATH ,FILE_NAME ,MIMETYPE ,USE_FLAG ,UPDATE_ID ,UPDATE_DATE ,REG_ID ,REG_DATE ,SITE_ID ,(SELECT SITE_NAME FROM TBL_SITE WHERE SITE_ID = TRT.SITE_ID) SITE_NAME ,(SELECT SG_ID FROM TBL_SITE WHERE SITE_ID = TRT.SITE_ID) SG_ID ,(SELECT SG_NAME FROM TBL_SITE_GROUP WHERE SG_ID = (SELECT SG_ID FROM TBL_SITE WHERE SITE_ID = TRT.SITE_ID)) SG_NAME FROM TBL_REPORT_TEMPLATE TRT WHERE RT_ID = #{rtId} AND USE_FLAG = 'Y'

/* ReportMapper.selectManageFacilitySpec */ SELECT mfs_id , site_id , chillerheater_cnt , chillerheater_vol , chillerheater_ele , chillerheater_gas , absor_tower_cnt , absor_tower_vol , absor_tower_ele , absor_pump_cnt , absor_pump_vol , absor_pump_ele , turbo_chiller_cnt , turbo_chiller_vol , turbo_chiller_ele , turbo_tower_cnt , turbo_tower_vol , turbo_tower_ele , turbo_pump_cnt , turbo_pump_vol , turbo_pump_ele , prev_absor_amt , prev_turbo_amt , prev_gas_amt , low_chiller_cnt , low_chiller_day_vol , low_chiller_day_ele , low_chiller_night_vol , low_chiller_night_ele , icethermal_tower_cnt , icethermal_tower_vol , icethermal_tower_ele , thermal_storage_cnt , thermal_storage_vol , heat_exchanger_cnt , heat_exchanger_vol , coolstorage_pump_cnt , coolstorage_pump_vol , coolstorage_pump_ele , relestorage_pump_cnt , relestorage_pump_vol , relestorage_pump_ele , brine_pump_cnt , brine_pump_vol , brine_pump_ele , cooling_pump_cnt , cooling_pump_vol , cooling_pump_ele , pres_icethermal_amt , pres_ele_day_amt , pres_ele_night_amt , use_flag , update_id , reg_id FROM tbl_manage_facility_spec WHERE site_id = #{siteId} AND use_flag = 'Y'

/* ReportMapper.selectManageFacilityRate */ SELECT mfr_id , site_id , absor_load_rate_05 , absor_load_rate_06 , absor_load_rate_07 , absor_load_rate_08 , absor_load_rate_09 , absor_load_rate_10 , turbo_load_rate_05 , turbo_load_rate_06 , turbo_load_rate_07 , turbo_load_rate_08 , turbo_load_rate_09 , turbo_load_rate_10 , absor_work_rate_05 , absor_work_rate_06 , absor_work_rate_07 , absor_work_rate_08 , absor_work_rate_09 , absor_work_rate_10 , absor_heat_eff_year , absor_heat_eff_rate , absor_asst_eff_year , absor_asst_eff_rate , absor_open_day , absor_work_hour , turbo_work_rate_05 , turbo_work_rate_06 , turbo_work_rate_07 , turbo_work_rate_08 , turbo_work_rate_09 , turbo_work_rate_10 , turbo_heat_eff_year , turbo_heat_eff_rate , turbo_asst_eff_year , turbo_asst_eff_rate , turbo_open_day , turbo_work_hour , elec_night_factor , elec_day_factor , reduction_elec , use_flag , update_id , reg_id FROM tbl_manage_facility_rate WHERE site_id = #{siteId} AND use_flag = 'Y'
